rooms.description: A small foyer that connects the entrance to the main living area. Incorporates minimalistic Colonial styling and local material finishes.
An expansive open-plan space combining kitchen with dining and living areas. Designed to maximize natural light using Vastu-aligned window placements and energy-efficient fixtures.
A dedicated gym area with necessary equipment storage, designed for compact yet efficient fitness training on the ground level. Adequate ventilation and sound insulation considered.
Includes storage, laundry facilities, and a compact pantry attached to the kitchen.

features: Vastu-aligned entrance with proper alignment towards the north-east direction for positive energy flow
Colonial style arched windows and door
Large sliding glass doors maximizing natural light while ensuring ventilation
Sound insulation incorporated to maintain privacy
Access for maintenance and utility purposes
Discrete design aligning with overall aesthetics
